title: [Widowmaker's Road]
description: Curving away from exposed bedrock and warped boulders to the southeast, a hard-packed dirt road cuts through a forest of hardwoods on a westerly track.  Bubbling brooks, coaxed from their natural pathways, tumble down either side of the road in manufactured beds of black, grey, green, brown, and white pebbles.  A slant of sunlight pierces through the heavy canopy to illuminate the area.

Curving away from exposed bedrock and warped boulders to the southeast, a hard-packed dirt road cuts through a forest of hardwoods on a westerly track.  Bubbling brooks, coaxed from their natural pathways, tumble down either side of the road in manufactured beds of black, grey, green, brown, and white pebbles.  A patch of dazzling starlight pierces through the heavy canopy to bathe the area in a halo of silver illumination.
